sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; function Header() { return (
  • Services
    • Ai & Automation
    • Statistical Data Analytics
    • Business Intelligence
    • Computer vision
    • Big data analytics
    • Natural Language processing
    • Deep learning
    • Ai for Gaming
    • Digital Signal Processing
    • Wearable computing
    • Distributed Computing
    • Mathematical modeling and optimizing
  • Industries
    • Health
    • Chemicals
    • Retail
    • Automative
    • Dental
    • Consumer Goods
    • BFSI
    • Energy
    • Oil and Gas
    • Capital Markets
    • Insurance
    • Media and Entertainment
  • About Scriptics

    about scriptics

    • Know Us
    • Case Studies

    Our structure

    • Work Strategy
    • Technologies we follow
    • Industries we serve

    Discover us

    • Contact Us
    • Locate Us
    • Subscribe to newsletter
  • Cloud Services
    • Thinkbox Studio
    • DevOps
    • Data Engineering & Analytics
    • AWS Elemental
    • Amazon EKS
    • Amazon Relational Database Service
    • Migration
    • Machine Learning
    • Amazon QuickSight
    • AWS Control Tower
    • Microsoft Workloads
    • Application Modernization
) } export default Header
